About the Company: Omax Autos Limited is an India-based company engaged in the manufacture and sale of auto components and parts for the two-wheeler and four-wheeler industry. The Company manufactures sheet metal parts, machined tubular, and electroplated and painted components. The Companys products for two wheelers include Steering Handle Assembly, Carrier, Side Cover , Engine Guard, Oil Pump Assembly, Sprocket Cam and Sproket Timing, Complete Frame Assembly, Pedal Kick Strater, Mufflier, Footrest, Main Stand , Brake Padel, Sprockets and Chain Case. The Companys products for four wheelers include Neck Fuel Filter, Trunk Hinge , Steering Column Shafts , Wiper Rods , Frame Assembly, Transmission Shafts, Rocker Arm Shaft, Truck Chassis, Back Plates for Brakeshoes, Piston Rods for Damper Assembly, Shround Fan, Door Beams, Half Shaft Bars, Base Battery Set and Seat Assembly. As of March 31, 2012, the Company had set-up its Pant Nagar Plant (in Udham Singh Nagar) for manufacturing of MHCV chassis part.
